thread.section_title: Bay Alarm Medical Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bay Alarm Medical | www.bayalarmmedical.com
thread.title: Henry Chiuppi
thread.title_full: Bay Alarm Medical reviewed by Henry Chiuppi

author: Henry Chiuppi
title: Henry Chiuppi
text: I tried the GreatCall Lively GPS model and after 5 devices in 2 months I gave up. They just kept dying.The Bay Medical GPS model works. I have had it for 2 months and tested it several times and it works. It doesn't have some features of the GreatCall but what's important is IT WORKS! Customer services has been very help when I call and ask questions.
